caption.p: ( a) SERS spectrum of oil with 100 mg/L furfural (Oil + Furfural + Substrate, blue line); Raman spectra of transformer oil with 100 mg/L furfural (Oil + Furfural, red line) and pure transformer oil (black line); ( b) SERS spectrum of oil with 100 mg/L furfural (Oil + Furfural + Substrate, blue line) and substrate (Substrate, red line); Raman spectrum of pure furfural (Furfural, black line).
